analyzed: jita māra kalim jagat eka gurum
sura yakṣa mahā uraga daitya natam
catu satya su deśita mārgam imam
su mukham su bhujam vara rūpa dharam
praṇatā asmi sadā jagat artha karam
śirasā abhinataḥ asmi guṇa eka nidhim
sphurat ugra mahā aśani bhīma ravaiḥ

original: ścalito'si vibho na hi tvaṃ vikṛtaiḥ || 5 ||

analyzed: nahi tvām aśakan khalu nāga sutāḥ
bahu ratna sahasra citāḥ ca nagāḥ
sphuṭa citra padam bahu yukti yutam
na gṛṇanti punar tvad ṛtenya vacaḥ
na patanti api kalpa śataiḥ niraye
śivam astu tatas bhuvi deva nṛṇām
